Name: ChucK
Other technical features: Unified timing mechanism (no separation between audio-rate and control-rate), command-line access

Name: Csound
Programming (plugin) API language(s): C; also Python, Java, Lisp, Lua, Tcl, C++
Other technical features: IDE (QuteCsound), multitrack interface (blue); several analysis/resynthesis facilities; can compute double-precision audio; Python and LuaJIT algorithmic composition library; multi-threaded processing

Name: Impromptu
Other technical features: Native access to most OS X APIs including Core Image, Quartz, QuickTime and OpenGL.  Impromptu also includes its own statically typed (inferencing) systems language for heavy numeric processing - OpenGL, RT AudioDSP etc..

Name: Kyma
Other technical features: The Kyma hardware processes user algorithms at sample-rate, as opposed to a vector of samples Kyma has a Frame.

Name: Max/MSP
Programming (plugin) API language(s): C, Java, Python and Ruby via externals

Name: Pure Data
Programming (plugin) API language(s): C, FAUST, Haskell, Java, Lua, Python, Q, Ruby, Scheme, others

Name: SuperCollider
Other technical features: Client-server architecture; client and server can be used independently, command-line access

Name: Sporth
Other technical features: Many frontends built using the API exist, including Chuck, PD, and LADSPA
